title: Rangpur Riders vs Bowler Hunters â€“ Clash of Titans in the 2025 Global Super League
description:
The 2025 Global Super League (GSL) is set to witness a thrilling encounter as the defending champions, Rangpur Riders, face off against the formidable Bowler Hunters. This match promises high-octane action, strategic brilliance, and a showcase of cricketing prowess at its finest.


Background:

The Rangpur Riders, a prominent franchise in the Bangladesh Premier League (BPL), have consistently demonstrated excellence on the field. Their victory in the inaugural GSL in 2024, where they defeated Cricket Victoria by 56 runs in the final, solidified their reputation as a powerhouse in T20 cricket. Key players like Soumya Sarkar, who was named Player of the Series, and captain Nurul Hasan have been instrumental in their success. Sportsmax+2News Room Guyana+2Stabroek News+2BDNews24+7Wikipedia+7Cricket World+7Stabroek News+6Sportsmax+6News Room Guyana+6

The Bowler Hunters, known for their aggressive bowling attack and tactical acumen, have been making waves in the T20 circuit. Their disciplined approach and ability to adapt to different match situations make them a formidable opponent.

Team Line-ups:

Rangpur Riders:

  • Captain: Nurul Hasan

  • Key Players: Soumya Sarkar, Steven Taylor, Mahedi Hasan, Harmeet Singh

  • Coach: Mickey Arthur The Financial Express+7Global Super League T20+7Wikipedia+7United News Bangladesh+3Cricket.com+3Wikipedia+3

Bowler Hunters:

  • Captain: [Captain's Name]

  • Key Players: [Player Names]

  • Coach: [Coach's Name]WikipediaCricket World+1Global Super League T20+1

Match Venue:

The match will be held at the Providence Stadium in Georgetown, Guyana. Known for its vibrant atmosphere and enthusiastic crowd, the stadium provides the perfect setting for this high-stakes encounter.

Key Battles to Watch:

  • Soumya Sarkar vs. Bowler Hunters' Pace Attack: Sarkar's aggressive batting style will be tested against the Hunters' formidable pace bowlers.

  • Spin Duel: The effectiveness of Rangpur's spinners, like Harmeet Singh, against the Hunters' middle order could be a deciding factor.

Whatâ€™s at Stake:

For the Rangpur Riders, a victory would reinforce their dominance in the GSL and boost their confidence for the rest of the tournament. For the Bowler Hunters, defeating the reigning champions would be a significant statement and could propel them to the top of the standings.Global Super League T20+3Stabroek News+3Sportsmax+3

Conclusion:

This match between the Rangpur Riders and the Bowler Hunters is more than just a game; it's a battle of strategies, skills, and nerves. Cricket enthusiasts can expect a captivating contest filled with thrilling moments and exceptional performances.

Note: Specific details about the Bowler Hunters' team composition and player statistics are currently unavailable. For the most accurate and up-to-date information, please refer to the official Global Super League website or the respective teams' official channels.

title: University of Scholars Celebrates Its 1st Convocation Ceremony
description:
On February 22, 2025, the University of Scholars marked a significant milestone by hosting its inaugural convocation ceremony at Senanprangon, Dhaka Cantonment. This historic event celebrated the academic achievements of its first graduating cohort, symbolizing the university's commitment to excellence in higher education.TBS News+4LinkedIn+4Facebook+4

Established in 2015, the University of Scholars has rapidly evolved into a reputable institution, offering diverse programs across various faculties. The convocation ceremony was a testament to the university's dedication to nurturing professionals equipped to meet global challenges.

The event featured addresses from esteemed faculty members and dignitaries, who commended the graduates for their perseverance and encouraged them to contribute meaningfully to society. The ceremony also included the conferral of degrees and special recognitions for outstanding academic performances.Uttara University

Graduates, adorned in traditional academic regalia, were joined by proud family members, friends, and faculty, creating an atmosphere of joy and accomplishment. The university's motto, "We Build Professionals," resonated throughout the event, reflecting its mission to produce skilled and ethical leaders.University of Scholars+1Wikipedia+1

The successful execution of the first convocation sets a precedent for future ceremonies, reinforcing the University of Scholars' role in shaping the educational landscape of Bangladesh.

title: University of Scholars Inter Department Cricket Battle 2025
description:
The University of Scholars hosted its much-anticipated Inter Department Cricket Battle 2025 from January 2 to January 11, 2025, at the Banani Shaheed Zayan Choudhury Playground in Dhaka. This vibrant tournament brought together ten departmental teams, competing fiercely across 24 matches in a 10-over format.CricHeroes

Participating Teams:

  • CSE Avengers

  • EEE Sparks

  • BBA Professionals

  • Scholars Thunders

  • Textile Titans

  • English Mavericks

  • Reverie Royals

  • Reverie Eagles

  • The Guardians

  • AlumniWikipedia+9CricHeroes+9CricHeroes+9Wikipedia

Tournament Highlights:

  • The CSE Avengers showcased exceptional performance, clinching the championship by defeating EEE Sparks in the final match held on January 11, 2025.CricHeroes

  • EEE Sparks demonstrated remarkable skill throughout the tournament, securing their place as the runners-up.

  • The tournament featured intense semi-final matches, with CSE Avengers overcoming Reverie Royals and EEE Sparks triumphing over English Mavericks to reach the finals.CricHeroes

  • Notable performances included BBA Professionals' commanding 66-run victory over Scholars Thunders and EEE Sparks' decisive 9-wicket win against the same team.CricHeroes+1Wikipedia+1

Acknowledgments:

The University of Scholars extends heartfelt gratitude to the Scholars Sports Club for their meticulous organization of the tournament, ensuring a seamless and engaging experience for all participants and spectators. Their dedication played a pivotal role in the success of the event.Facebook

Further Information:

For detailed match statistics, player performances, and more insights into the tournament, please visit the official tournament page on CricHeroes: CricHeroesCricHeroes+1CricHeroes+1

For additional updates and information about upcoming events at the University of Scholars, please visit the official university website: mail.ius.edu.bd

title: ThinkSpire 12 Session 2 â€“ Empowering Future Leaders at the University of Scholars
description:
On January 10, 2025, the University of Scholars hosted the second session of its flagship mentorship and leadership development series, ThinkSpire 12. This session, held at the university's Banani campus, was designed to inspire and equip students with the skills and mindset necessary for leadership in the modern world.

Event Highlights:

  • Keynote Address: The session featured a powerful keynote address by the esteemed Vice Chairman of the Board of Trustees, who shared insights on leadership, innovation, and the importance of a growth mindset.Facebook+3Facebook+3Instagram+3

  • Interactive Workshops: Students participated in interactive workshops focusing on critical thinking, problem-solving, and effective communication, facilitated by experienced mentors and industry professionals.

  • Networking Opportunities: Attendees had the chance to network with alumni and professionals, fostering connections that could support their academic and career aspirations.

Impact:

The session was met with enthusiasm and positive feedback from participants, who appreciated the opportunity to engage with thought leaders and develop skills that are essential for success in today's dynamic environment.

title: Winter Pitha and Puli Festival
description:
The Winter Pitha and Puli Festival is a cherished annual celebration in Bangladesh, held during the winter months, particularly around the Bengali months of Poush and Magh. This festival celebrates the rich culinary heritage of Bengali sweets, known as 'pitha' and 'puli', which are traditionally made from rice flour, jaggery, coconut, and other local ingredients.

During this time, families and communities come together to prepare and enjoy a variety of pithas and pulis, each with its unique taste and preparation method. Some popular varieties include:Wikipedia+1Wikipedia+1

  • Vapa Pitha: Steamed rice cakes filled with jaggery and coconut.Wikipedia

  • Chitai Pitha: Thin crepes made from rice flour, often served with sweet syrup.Wikipedia

  • Patisapta: Crepes filled with a mixture of khoya (reduced milk) and coconut, then rolled and served with syrup.

  • Nakshi Pitha: Decorative rice flour cakes adorned with intricate designs, symbolizing Bengali folk art.

The festival is not only about food but also about community bonding. In rural areas, it's common for neighbors to exchange pithas and pulis, strengthening social ties. In urban settings, pitha festivals are organized in various venues, attracting people from all walks of life to partake in this sweet tradition.
